## Description {#details}

Serialize the remarks to YAML using a string table.

An remark entry looks like the regular YAML remark but instead of string entries it&#39;s using numbers that map to an index in the string table.

Definition at line 68 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/yamlremarkserializer-h">YAMLRemarkSerializer.h</a>.
